replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
手上拿着名为abc的萝卜柑时玩家获得标签tad
/scoreboard players tag @a add tad {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:iron_sword",tag:{display:{Name:"abc"}}}}


之后就是建立对应萝卜柑的记分板判据stat.useItem.minecraft.carrot_on_a_stick，参考...
